trans-unit.source: Represents a claim for a <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken" /> security token that asserts that the subject was authenticated by a particular means at a particular time.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken" /> 安全性權杖的宣告，這個宣告會判斷該主體會在特定時間以特定方式通過驗證。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security tokens specify their claims using SAML assertions, which can specify when the subject was authenticated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> 安全性權杖會使用 SAML 判斷提示 (Assertion) 來指定其宣告，而這種判斷指示可指定何時驗證此主體。

trans-unit.source: The claims in a SAML assertion are represented by SAML statements.
trans-unit.target: SAML 判斷提示中的宣告會以 SAML 陳述式表示。

trans-unit.source: The SAML specification defines a set of SAML statement types and one of them is a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement>.
trans-unit.target: SAML 規格會定義一組 SAML 陳述式型別，而其中一個為 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement> asserts that the statement's subject was authenticated by a particular means at a particular time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement> 可判斷該陳述式主體會在特定時間以特定方式通過驗證。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubject" /> that represents the subject of the claim.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubject" />，表示宣告的主體。

trans-unit.source: A URI reference that specifies how the subject was authenticated.
trans-unit.target: URI 參考，其中指定驗證主體的方式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that specifies the instant in time at which the subject was authenticated.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />，其中指定主體通過驗證的瞬間。

trans-unit.source: The DNS domain name in which the computer that authenticated the subject resides.
trans-unit.target: 驗證主體所在電腦的 DNS 網域名稱。

trans-unit.source: The IP address of the computer that authenticated the subject.
trans-unit.target: 驗證主體之電腦的 IP 位址。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> of type <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding" /> that contains additional information about the subject.
trans-unit.target: 型別為 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding" />，其中包含有關主體的其他資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement" /> class using the specified authentication details.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的驗證詳細資料，初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The set of authentication methods is extensible; however the following table contains the set of authentication methods defined in the SAML specification.
trans-unit.target: 驗證方法的集合具有擴充性；但是下表包含的是已定義於 SAML 規格中的驗證方法集合。

trans-unit.source: Authentication method
trans-unit.target: 驗證方法

trans-unit.source: URI
trans-unit.target: URI

trans-unit.source: Password
trans-unit.target: 密碼

trans-unit.source: urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:password
trans-unit.target: urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:password

trans-unit.source: Kerberos
trans-unit.target: Kerberos

trans-unit.source: urn:ietf:rfc:1510
trans-unit.target: urn:ietf:rfc:1510

trans-unit.source: Secure Remote Password (SRP)
trans-unit.target: 安全遠端密碼 (SRP)

trans-unit.source: urn:ietf:rfc:2945
trans-unit.target: urn:ietf:rfc:2945

trans-unit.source: Hardware Token
trans-unit.target: 硬體權杖

trans-unit.source: URI:urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:HardwareToken
trans-unit.target: URI:urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:HardwareToken

trans-unit.source: SSL/TLS Certificate Based Client Authentication
trans-unit.target: 以 SSL/TLS 憑證為基礎的用戶端驗證

trans-unit.source: urn:ietf:rfc:2246
trans-unit.target: urn:ietf:rfc:2246

trans-unit.source: PGP Public Key
trans-unit.target: PGP 公開金鑰

trans-unit.source: urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:PGP
trans-unit.target: urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:PGP

trans-unit.source: SPKI Public Key
trans-unit.target: SPKI 公開金鑰

trans-unit.source: urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:SPKI
trans-unit.target: urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:SPKI

trans-unit.source: XKMS Public Key
trans-unit.target: XKMS 公開金鑰

trans-unit.source: urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:XKMS
trans-unit.target: urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:XKMS

trans-unit.source: XML Digital Signature
trans-unit.target: XML 數位簽章

trans-unit.source: urn:ietf:rfc:3075
trans-unit.target: urn:ietf:rfc:3075

trans-unit.source: Unspecified
trans-unit.target: 未指定

trans-unit.source: urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified
trans-unit.target: urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified

trans-unit.source: When the `authenticationMethod` parameter is `null`, the authentication method is set to `urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified`.
trans-unit.target: 當 `authenticationMethod` 參數是 `null` 時，驗證方法會設定為 `urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="authorityBindings" /> contains a member that is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="authorityBindings" /> 包含的成員為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" /> of type <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim" /> that contains the set of claims to add to.
trans-unit.target: 型別為 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim" />，其中包含要新增之宣告的集合。

trans-unit.source: Adds a claim based on the properties of this instance to the specified collection of claims.
trans-unit.target: 根據這個執行個體的屬性，將宣告新增至指定的宣告集合中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AddClaimsToList%28System.Collections.Generic.IList%7BSystem.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim%7D%29> method adds a claim to the `claims` parameter based on the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationInstant%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationMethod%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthorityBindings%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.ClaimType%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.DnsAddress%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IPAddress%2A>, and properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AddClaimsToList%28System.Collections.Generic.IList%7BSystem.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim%7D%29> 方法會根據 `claims`、<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationInstant%2A>、<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationMethod%2A>、<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthorityBindings%2A>、<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.ClaimType%2A>、<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.DnsAddress%2A> 以及屬性，將宣告加入至 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IPAddress%2A> 參數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="claims" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="claims" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the instant in time at which the subject was authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定主體通過驗證的瞬間。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that specifies the instant in time at which the subject was authenticated.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />，其中指定主體通過驗證的瞬間。

trans-unit.source: <list type="table"><listheader><term> Exception type
trans-unit.target: <list type="table"><listheader><term> 例外狀況類型

trans-unit.source: </term><description> Condition
trans-unit.target: </term><description>條件

trans-unit.source: </description></listheader><item><term><see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /></term><description> The <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationInstant" /> property is set and the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IsReadOnly" /> property is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: </description></listheader><item><term><see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /></term><description> <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationInstant" />屬性設定和<see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IsReadOnly" />屬性是<see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The time is stored in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: 時間是以 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) 格式存放。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationInstant%2A> property corresponds to the `AuthenticationInstant` attribute of the `<AuthenticationStatement>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationInstant%2A> 屬性 (Property) 會對應到已在 Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) 規格中定義之 `AuthenticationInstant` 項目的 `<AuthenticationStatement>` 屬性 (Attribute)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the method used to authenticate the subject.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來驗證主體的方法。

trans-unit.source: The method used to authenticate the subject.
trans-unit.target: 用來驗證主體的方法。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified" />。

trans-unit.source: The set of authentication methods is extensible; however the following table contains the set of authentication methods defined in the SAML specification.
trans-unit.target: 驗證方法的集合具有擴充性；但是下表包含的是已定義於 SAML 規格中的驗證方法集合。

trans-unit.source: Authentication method
trans-unit.target: 驗證方法

trans-unit.source: URI
trans-unit.target: URI

trans-unit.source: Password
trans-unit.target: 密碼

trans-unit.source: urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:password
trans-unit.target: urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:password

trans-unit.source: Kerberos
trans-unit.target: Kerberos

trans-unit.source: urn:ietf:rfc:1510
trans-unit.target: urn:ietf:rfc:1510

trans-unit.source: Secure Remote Password (SRP)
trans-unit.target: 安全遠端密碼 (SRP)

trans-unit.source: urn:ietf:rfc:2945
trans-unit.target: urn:ietf:rfc:2945

trans-unit.source: Hardware Token
trans-unit.target: 硬體權杖

trans-unit.source: URI:urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:HardwareToken
trans-unit.target: URI:urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:HardwareToken

trans-unit.source: SSL/TLS Certificate Based Client Authentication
trans-unit.target: 以 SSL/TLS 憑證為基礎的用戶端驗證

trans-unit.source: urn:ietf:rfc:2246
trans-unit.target: urn:ietf:rfc:2246

trans-unit.source: PGP Public Key
trans-unit.target: PGP 公開金鑰

trans-unit.source: urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:PGP
trans-unit.target: urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:PGP

trans-unit.source: SPKI Public Key
trans-unit.target: SPKI 公開金鑰

trans-unit.source: urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:SPKI
trans-unit.target: urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:SPKI

trans-unit.source: XKMS Public Key
trans-unit.target: XKMS 公開金鑰

trans-unit.source: urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:XKMS
trans-unit.target: urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:XKMS

trans-unit.source: XML Digital Signature
trans-unit.target: XML 數位簽章

trans-unit.source: urn:ietf:rfc:3075
trans-unit.target: urn:ietf:rfc:3075

trans-unit.source: Unspecified
trans-unit.target: 未指定

trans-unit.source: urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified
trans-unit.target: urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationMethod%2A> property is set to `null`, the authentication method is set to `urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified`.
trans-unit.target: 當 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationMethod%2A> 屬性設定為 `null` 時，驗證方法會設定為 `urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationMethod%2A> property corresponds to the `AuthenticationMethod` attribute of the `<AuthenticationStatement>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationMethod%2A> 屬性 (Property) 會對應到已在 Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) 規格中定義之 `AuthenticationMethod` 項目的 `<AuthenticationStatement>` 屬性 (Attribute)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationMethod" /> property is set and the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IsReadOnly" /> property is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 系統會設定 <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationMethod" /> 屬性，而 <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IsReadOnly" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets additional information about the subject.
trans-unit.target: 取得有關主體的其他資訊。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" /> of type <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding" /> that contains additional information about the subject.
trans-unit.target: 型別為 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding" />，其中包含有關主體的其他資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthorityBindings%2A> property corresponds to a set of `<AuthorityBinding>` child elements for an `<AuthenticationStatement>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthorityBindings%2A> 屬性 (Property) 會對應到 `<AuthorityBinding>` 項目的 `<AuthenticationStatement>` 子項目集合，而該項目已定義在 Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) 規格中。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of security claim.
trans-unit.target: 取得安全性宣告的型別。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimTypes" /> that specifies the type of security claim.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimTypes" />，其中指定安全性宣告的型別。

trans-unit.source: Always <c>http://schemas.microsoft.com/mb/2005/09/ClaimType/SamlAuthentication</c>.
trans-unit.target: 一律<c> http://schemas.microsoft.com/mb/2005/09/ClaimType/SamlAuthentication </c>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the DNS domain name in which the computer that authenticated the subject resides.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定驗證主體所在電腦的 DNS 網域名稱。

trans-unit.source: The DNS domain name in which the computer that authenticated the subject resides.
trans-unit.target: 驗證主體所在電腦的 DNS 網域名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.DnsAddress%2A> property corresponds to the `DNSAddress` attribute of the `<SubjectLocality>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.DnsAddress%2A> 屬性 (Property) 會對應到已在 Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) 規格中定義之 `DNSAddress` 項目的 `<SubjectLocality>` 屬性 (Attribute)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.DnsAddress" /> property is set and the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IsReadOnly" /> property is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 系統會設定 <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.DnsAddress" /> 屬性，而 <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IsReadOnly" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the IP address of the computer that authenticated the subject.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定驗證主體之電腦的 IP 位址。

trans-unit.source: The IP address of the computer that authenticated the subject.
trans-unit.target: 驗證主體之電腦的 IP 位址。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IPAddress%2A> property corresponds to the `IPAddress` attribute of the `<SubjectLocality>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IPAddress%2A> 屬性 (Property) 會對應到已在 Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) 規格中定義之 `IPAddress` 項目的 `<SubjectLocality>` 屬性 (Attribute)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the properties of this instance are read-only.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值會指出這個執行個體的屬性是否是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the properties of this instance are read-only; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個執行個體的屬性是唯讀的，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: To make this instance of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement> class read-only, call the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.MakeReadOnly%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 為了讓 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement> 類別的這個執行個體變成唯讀的，此時會呼叫 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.MakeReadOnly%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Causes this instance to be read-only.
trans-unit.target: 使得這個執行個體成為唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.MakeReadOnly%2A> method is called, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IsReadOnly%2A> property is set to `true` and properties of this instance can no longer be set.
trans-unit.target: 當呼叫 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.MakeReadOnly%2A> 方法時，<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IsReadOnly%2A> 屬性會設定為 `true`，而且將無法再設定這個執行個體的屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader" /> to read the SAML authentication statement.
trans-unit.target: 要讀取 SAML 驗證陳述式的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer" /> that is capable of reading XML elements in the SAML authentication statement that is defined in the SAML specification.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer" />，它能夠從 SAML 驗證陳述式讀取 SAML 規格中所定義的 XML 項目。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver" /> that determines the security token that created the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver" />，它會判定建立數位簽章的安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: Reads the SAML authentication statement from the specified XML reader.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的 XML 讀取器讀取 SAML 驗證陳述式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.ReadXml%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29> method sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationInstant%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationMethod%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthorityBindings%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.DnsAddress%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IPAddress%2A>, and properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.ReadXml%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29> 方法會設定 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationInstant%2A>、<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationMethod%2A>、<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthorityBindings%2A>、<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.DnsAddress%2A>、<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IPAddress%2A> 以及屬性。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="reader" /> is <see langword="null" />
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="reader" /> 是 <see langword="null" />

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="samlSerializer" /> is <see langword="null" />
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="samlSerializer" /> 是 <see langword="null" />

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="reader" /> refers to an XML element that does not contain the <see langword="AuthenticationInstant" /> and <see langword="AuthenticationMethod" /> attributes.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="reader" /> 會參考不包含 <see langword="AuthenticationInstant" /> 和 <see langword="AuthenticationMethod" /> 屬性的 XML 項目。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="reader" /> refers to an XML element that does not have a <see langword="<saml:Subject>" /> child element.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="reader" /> 會參考其中沒有 <see langword="<saml:Subject>" /> 子項目的 XML 項目。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> to write the SAML authentication statement.
trans-unit.target: 要寫入 SAML 驗證陳述式的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer" /> that is capable of writing XML elements in a SAML assertion.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer" />，它能夠將 XML 項目寫入至 SAML 判斷提示。

trans-unit.source: Writes the SAML authentication statement into the specified XML serializer.
trans-unit.target: 將 SAML 驗證陳述式寫入至指定的 XML 序列化程式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="writer" /> is <see langword="null" />
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="writer" /> 是 <see langword="null" />

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="samlSerializer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="samlSerializer" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。
